snippet: During a New Year's Eve party at the Rangers' hotel in Philadelphia, Brandon Dubinsky's grandfather offers a simple toast: Drink up. And drink up we did, from the buildup caught on HBO's cameras to the game itself to the subsequent jubilation and...
abstract: During a New Year's Eve party at the Rangers' hotel in Philadelphia, Brandon Dubinsky's grandfather offers a simple toast: Drink up. And drink up we did, from the buildup caught on HBO's cameras to the game itself to the subsequent jubilation and heartache.
lead_paragraph: There were so many story lines woven into the Winter Classic between the Flyers and the Rangers, you had to wonder how HBO could possibly do it justice. Sean Avery was waived. Ilya Bryzgalov was benched (and went straight to the news media). Marc Staal was cleared to play. Questionable calls were followed by questionable reactions.
